      • zipFiles

        public static boolean zipFiles(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> srcFiles,
                               java.lang.String zipFilePath)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Zip the files.
        参数:
        srcFiles - The source of files.
        zipFilePath - The path of ZIP file.
        返回:
        true: success
        false: fail
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred
